name: Yandere Simulator Development Simulator
description:
Game made in jest of the chaotic Yandere Simulator development.
Yandere Dev needs to take a break from his game and learn to:

  • Accept criticism.
  • Stop harassing other game developers for making similar games.

Keyboard Controls:
Keys 1-4: Consume, code, ban, and stream, respectively.
Key L: Show/hide FPS.

This game was made in five days using Unity2D, Photoshop, GarageBand, and Audacity.
